item.title: Gear I Use
item.description: Hardware I do most personal stuff on a Meshlicious 14L SFF PC build with compromises made to fit an RTX3070 (which I barely use) and 2TBs of NVMe storage (which I kind of use).

item.title: Reasons to learn a new skill
item.description: self growth - what makes you tick, how to emotionally regulate [[learning about learning]] connect ideas across skills via [[skill cross-pollination]] practice getting into flow open doors to people / events / ideas teach others and help them learning in public to generate [[learning exhaust]]
